allow: Bash("C:/Program Files/Git/bin/bash.exe" -c 'cd /c/Projects/inspig-repo/inspig && echo ""=== Starting deploy ==="" && source ./deploy.sh')
Bash("C:/Program Files/Git/bin/bash.exe" -c 'cd /c/Projects/inspig-repo/inspig && pwd && git diff --name-only HEAD | head -5')

Bash("C:/Program Files/Git/bin/bash.exe" -c '
cd /c/Projects/inspig-repo/inspig

KEY_PATH=""E:/ssh key/sshkey/aws/ProdPigplanKey.pem""
REMOTE_PATH=""/data/insightPig""
SERVERS=\(""10.4.38.10"" ""10.4.99.10""\)
USER=""pigplan""

# 배포할 파일들
FILES=\(
    ""web/src/app/\(report\)/weekly/_components/popups/MatingPopup.tsx""
    ""web/src/app/\(report\)/weekly/_components/popups/FarrowingPopup.tsx""
    ""web/src/app/\(report\)/weekly/_components/popups/WeaningPopup.tsx""
\)

echo ""=== 배포 시작 ===""
for SERVER in ""${SERVERS[@]}""; do
    echo "">>> 배포 중: $SERVER""
    for file in ""${FILES[@]}""; do
        dir=$\(dirname ""$file""\)
        ssh -i ""$KEY_PATH"" ${USER}@${SERVER} ""mkdir -p ${REMOTE_PATH}/${dir}"" 2>/dev/null
        scp -i ""$KEY_PATH"" ""$file"" ${USER}@${SERVER}:${REMOTE_PATH}/${file}
        if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
            echo ""  [OK] $file""
        else
            echo ""  [FAIL] $file""
        fi
    done
    echo """"
done
echo ""=== 배포 완료 ===""
')
